articles.title: What Spotify Technology (SPOT)'s Music Video Push and Piracy Challenge Means For Shareholders
articles.mainIdea: What Spotify Technology (SPOT)'s Music Video Push and Piracy Challenge Means For Shareholders
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: What Spotify Technology (SPOT)'s Music Video Push and Piracy Challenge Means For Shareholders. Earlier in December, Spotify expanded its beta rollout of official music videos to Premium users in the US and Canada, after testing in nearly 100 markets and featuring artists such as Ariana Grande and Olivia Dean to deepen engagement and compete more directly with YouTube. Almost simultaneously, the company confronted what may be the largest music piracy incident to date, an illicit archive scraped from its catalog, spotlighting the financial and reputational stakes of content security...

articles.title: “Tax Loss Harvesting” Drives $825M Outflow From Bitcoin ETFs This Week: Analyst
articles.mainIdea: “Tax Loss Harvesting” Drives $825M Outflow From Bitcoin ETFs This Week: Analyst
articles.summary: Cryptonews: “Tax Loss Harvesting” Drives $825M Outflow From Bitcoin ETFs This Week: Analyst. U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs have recorded eight consecutive days of institutional selling, with total outflows reaching approximately $825 million as year-end tax strategies dominate market behavior.According to analyst Alek, the sustained selling pressure stems primarily from tax loss harvesting. He claimed it is a temporary phenomenon expected to conclude within ... Related tickers mentioned: BLK, BTC-USD, ETH-USD, IBIT, SOL-USD, XRP-USD.
